title: Software Engineer (L4) - Platform Modernization
overview: The Software Engineer (L4) - Platform Modernization position at Netflix involves building and managing scalable automation to improve the migration experience for customers, collaborating with teams to execute software change campaigns effectively, and identifying opportunities to increase development velocity and reduce total cost of ownership.

extras.title: Responsibilities:
content: Partner with other teams in Platform Engineering organization to deeply understand the current product suite, customer personas, usage patterns, on-ramp and off-ramp flows.

Collaborate closely with customer teams and explain the value proposition and technical requirements of change campaigns, understand their use case scenarios and software ecosystem to create tailored strategies to execute software change campaigns effectively

Exceptional collaboration and communication skills and a product centric mindset
